crew.notes: Commander, Driver, Turret Gunner, Loader, 2 Add. Gunners

system.weapons:
Turret Gunner: Battle Cannon (Turret, 750m, S/-/-, 3d10+10 X, Pen 8, Pen 8, Clip 12, Rld 3 Full, Blast(10), Concussive(3), Reliable)

Hull, one of: Front Facing, Heavy Bolter/Lascannon/Heavy Flamer

Sponson (Optional): one of: 2x Heavy Bolter/2x Heavy Flamer/2x Plasma Cannon

Pintle (Optional): one of: Facing All, Heavy Stubber/Storm Bolter

---

Heavy Bolter (150m, -/-/6, 1d10+8 X, Pen 5, Clip 60, Rld Full, Tearing)

Lascannon (300m, S/-/-, 5d10+10 E, Pen 10, Clip 30, Rld 2 Full, Proven(3))

Heavy Flamer (30m, S/-/-, 1d10+5 E, Pen 4, Clip 20, Rld 2 Full, Flame, Spray)

Plasma Cannon(120m, S/-/-, 2d10+10 E, Pen 8, Clip 32, Rld 5 Full, Blast (1), Maximal, Overheat)

Heavy Stubber(100m, -/-/8, 1d10+4 I, Pen 3, Clip 80, Rld 2 Full)

Storm Bolter(90m, S/2/4, 1d10+4, Pen 4, Clip 60, Rld Full, Storm, Tearing)
system.specialRules:
Vehicle Traits: Enclosed, Reinforced Armour, Rugged, Tracked Vehicle

Summary: Halve Damage from non-Righteous Fury, +20 to Repair.

+10 to Difficult Terrain Tests, halve Critical roll that determines if Tactical Speed is halved (rounded down). Critical Damage to motive systems takes twice as long.
